text: Jersey is a census-designated place (CDP) in Licking County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== Jersey was laid out in 1832, taking its name from Jersey Township. A post office was established at Jersey in 1833, and remained in operation until 1907. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Licking County, Ohio Category:Census-designated places in Ohio Category:1832 establishments in Ohio Category:Populated places established in 1832
title: Jersey, Ohio
